Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: Morgan Stanley has undergone a formal external bias audit for its AI recruiting systems, demonstrating concrete compliance with fairness regulations. Additional sources provide comprehensive frameworks and technical guidance for bias detection and mitigation in AI. The evidence indicates a robust approach to fairness and bias mitigation.

summary.overallFindings: Morgan Stanley demonstrates comprehensive and mature responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with robust evidence for transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and public accountability. The company provides detailed public documentation, formal audits, and organizational structures supporting responsible AI. No significant gaps were identified, indicating a high level of commitment and external engagement in responsible AI.
